testsuite.name: API Test Suite for Note Management Backend

testcase.classname: API Test Suite for Note Management Backend › Authentication (POST /login) Positive: Successful login with valid credentials - should return 200 and a token

testcase.classname: API Test Suite for Note Management Backend › Authentication (POST /login) Negative: Failed login with invalid credentials - should return 401

testcase.classname: API Test Suite for Note Management Backend › Item Creation (POST /items) Negative: Attempting to create an item with missing title - should return 400
